features: RECHARGEABLE BATTERY– With built-in rechargeable Lithium Battery, both the microphone(s) and the receiver support 7 hours working time and can be easily charged by USB power supply. Never be annoyed by replacing battery anymore.

CRYSTAL CLEAR SOUND & RELIABLE WIRELESS PERFORMANCE – Built-in high sensitivity professional Dynamic moving-coil capsule ensures Crystal CLEAR SOUND with working range up to 60ft. UHF digital wireless technology provides a stronger signal and ultra-high Fidelity, reducing the possibility from Bluetooth or WIFI interference and dropouts.
FULL COMPATABILITY- Dual-mode (Digital/Analog) USB receiver with built-in sound card is compatible with PC ( Windows / Mac), iPhone Android phones, Plug and Play, No extra drivers needed.

MULTI APPLICATIONS - Ideal for online teaching, podcast, live recording, teacher classroom amplifier, voice over projection, YouTube streaming, capturing interview, outdoor performance, enjoy your charming voice with this USB mic

EASY SETUP & OPERATE - Plug & Play, cable-free, the wireless mic system is preset with 20 selectable frequencies. (902-928Mhz complies with FCC rules) Automatic frequency pairing makes it portable, versatile and easy to setup, less prone to interference and low distortion, thus to use its best performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for outdoor Zoom meetings!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second attempt at using a wireless USB microphone (the first was disappointing due to design intent product behavior).We used this primarily for outdoor group Zoom meetings with multiple people using the mic, where a laptop microphone or wired microphone wasn't going to work out. We have only used it as a USB input device for a windows computer, though I did test using the output jack to hook to a PA system once and that worked great too.On Windows10 and Windows7 it just worked - no driver download required. Not tried on other operating systems.Here are the good points:Distance - worked great in outdoor area where microphone was as far as 25 feet from the USB dongle (we did not try much further than that)Clarity - Even our softest spoken people were easy to hear on the Zoom call. No background noise at all - but if you point the mic at a gathering of people, that worked well for hearing them okay also.Battery Life - we used this 2 hours one day a week and two batteries has lasted for 10 weeks or more. Having a battery meter on the mic is great, so you can keep an eye on it.Durability - we have not broken it yet despite the occasional drop/throw. Feels very sturdy.Issues/suggestions.It would be nice if there was a mute button, but turning it on/off works fine.One time there was some interference, but it seems to be more about how the person was holding it, perhaps blocking signal to the USB adapter - once they adjusted it was fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I have to say I’m pleasantly surprised at how well this mic works and how good the sound quality is. It really does a great job of keeping out the background noise. My daughter was using it right in front of the sound system speakers while something was playing and you could really only hear what she was saying and not the loud noise behind her. Got this to conduct for interviews for my music channel, and I have to say it exceeds expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2018
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I took this to a recent Wizard World convention so I could record interviews and it worked pretty well. The only thing I really had to worry about was that the receiver was picking up the mike. I think it's worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Create for karaoke, ONLY if you have a speaker with aux input.
reviews.reviewText: 0 latency when connected directly to speaker. If connected throu PC, the soundcard would add lots of latency make it unuseable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not work. Could not connect through Bluetooth with the computer or phone as it claims.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Never had an issue with other mics like this. Got a really big important interview and it messed up the audio. Don't recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Performs extremely well
reviews.reviewText: The two things I liked the most are 1) The microphone has a rechargeable battery that came with a USB cable to charge it, and it was pre-charged before shipment. 2) The operating range is terrific.It was extremely easy to get it working - just turn on the microphone, plug the receiver into a USB port, and tell the S/W to use it as the microphone of choice. And the box that it came in is perfect to move the entire system from place to place. What a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Helps us run monthly meetings with in-person and Zoom attendees
reviews.reviewText: There aren’t a lot of options for a Bluetooth mic that isn’t part of a larger audio system. Tried another of similar price and in testing that one had a few issues. Was pleasantly surprised in testing and during our first event with this mic. Worked great. Connected from the back of the usb plug to our local speaker for voice support for folks in the room. For Zoom, the output was very high. Had to turn down Zoom output (audio settings) for mic but crank up the speaker to help balance the audio. Positive experience for the folks online and in the room. Simple solution!

This microphone is fantastic! It was extremely easy to set up and start using right away. The people online for the meeting in "TV land" could hear the speaker very well. One thing to note though, when the speaker is holding the mic and moving their hands - the people online can not hear as well. Also, if people in the live-audience are clapping their hands, it takes away the sound of the person speaking in to the microphone - so save the applause to the end of the presentation. :) Other than that - this was a huge hit for our large team meetings :)

reviews.reviewerName: Una muy buena herramienta para trasmitir en redes... Una muy buena herramienta para trasmitir en redes...
reviews.reviewTitle: Muy bueno y fácil de usar

reviews.reviewText: Realmente estoy sorprendido de lo fácil que fue instalar y utilizar el micrófono, no hay más, conectar y listo. La fidelidad de audio es espectacular y tiene gran sensibilidad con todos los sonidos, me ha servido para conferencias y para algunas grabaciones. Tiene un amplio rango de acción para el micrófono y no hace interferencia con cualquier otro dispositivo conectado, y la batería es de larga duración, mencionando además que es recargable cosa que siempre se agradece.
El micrófono es muy bueno. Viene 1 por compra. Está muy bien aunque se escucha algo de ruido de fondo y si hace mucho viento se escucha también.
